home.title: Fractal: Beyond the Void Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Fractal: Beyond the Void against automated opponents. You can play solo or add additional opponents to 2 and 3 player games.
home.play2: You need the Fractal: Automata expansion. This application replaces the AI protocol and AI behavior cards and helps managing the faction abilities.

setupBot.title: Automata Setup
setupBot.factionMap: Place the faction mat to the left of the empire board. Place the corresponding faction token for the chosen color on the empire board.
setupBot.empireBoard: On the Automata empire board, place the corresponding colonies, influence marker on 1, and victory points marker on 0.
setupBot.tacticCards: Shuffle the AI tactic cards and AI elite tactic cards to form the AI tactic deck. Shuffle and set the rest of the elite AI tactics aside to form the reserve. Place each deck in its corresponding space.

tacticCardDifficultyLevel.1: Shuffle all non-elite tactic cars as deck. Put all elite tactic cards in the reserve.
tacticCardDifficultyLevel.2: Replace 1 random AI tactic card with the elite tactic card with the same name and shuffle it with the other non-elite tactic cards in the deck. Put the remaining elite tactic cards in the reserve.
tacticCardDifficultyLevel.3: Replace 2 random AI tactic cards with the elite tactic cards with the same name and shuffle them with the other non-elite tactic cards in the deck. Put the remaining elite tactic cards in the reserve.

setupBot.startingUnits: Deploy the colony and starting units in the starting sector.
setupBot.singularity: Shuffle the following singularities and place one face-down on the Utopian sector:

cycleIncome.title: Cycle {cycle}: Income
cycleIncome.startPlayer: Determine start player for this cycle:
cycleIncome.gainIncome: Human players gain credits and resources from exploitation areas.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
